biotools.summary: Portable Database for Metabolism. It is a format to centralizes, in a new graph-based PADMet, all information about a metabolic network. It also provides methods to import, to update, to analyse and to export data, in a library.

bioschemas.name: PADMet
bioschemas.summary: Portable Database for Metabolism. It is a format to centralizes, in a new graph-based PADMet, all information about a metabolic network. It also provides methods to import, to update, to analyse and to export data, in a library.
